1.title: Mayoi Hell, Part One
1.plot: Part 1 of 2. When Koyomi wakes up, Mayoi is close by. He recalls he was killed by Izuko. Mayoi tells him they are in the lowest of hell now. They go on the journey to waiting one while they look back on the incidents that happened within 1 year.

2.title: Mayoi Hell, Part Two
2.plot: Part 2 of 2. Tadatsuru is waiting for Koyomi. He has prepared with Izuko at Meme's request for when the worst enemy for Koyomi and Shinobu appears. Who is the worst enemy? Why did Koyomi have to be killed?

3.title: Hitagi Date, Part One
3.plot: Part 1 of 2. The early evening of March 13th. Koyomi finished 2nd stage exam of university admissions. He and Hitagi made a promise to go out on a date tomorrow. The morning of March 14th. They go to a planetarium by her car. She tells him that Tsubasa found Meme.

4.title: Hitagi Date, Part Two
4.plot: Part 2 of 2. Koyomi meets Ougi in a dream while he takes a nap in a planetarium. Ougi compares Koyomi and the people concerned to some constellation, especially Serpens and Ophiuchus. And then, she asks him not to cooperate with Izuko.

5.title: Ougi Darkness, Part One
5.plot: Part 1 of 3. The night of March 14th. When Koyomi goes to Shirahebi park with Yotsugi, Izuko has already been there with Mayoi and grown Shinobu. Izuko explains the history about Kita-shirahebi shrine and Shirahebi park. And finally she tells them her plan.

6.title: Ougi Darkness, Part Two
6.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

7.title: Ougi Darkness, Part Three
7.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Ougi Formula
1.plot: October 24th. Suruga introduces a transfer student Ougi Oshino to Koyomi. According to a self-introduction, she is Meme's niece and likes solving a mystery. Ougi asks Koyomi for help to solve a mystery which she found in audio-visual room at their high school. However, Koyomi and Ougi are trapped in a mystical space as soon as they enter the room. And then, Koyomi has to face his bad memory from 2 years ago.

2.title: Sodachi Riddle, Part One
2.plot: Part 1 of 2. The morning of October 25th. Koyomi meets Sodachi again, but she has hated him yet that's why she conflicts with Hitagi. Koyomi learns he and Sodachi were classmates when they were middle school students, so he visits middle school where they attended with Ougi to look for a clue to solve the problem in the afternoon.

3.title: Sodachi Riddle, Part Two
3.plot: Part 2 of 2. A day of the summer, 5 years ago. Koyomi visited a vacant house with a invitation letter. A girl was waiting for him, and then, they studied mathematics together. He kept going to the house everyday, but a last day of summer vacation, she suddenly left without saying anything to him. --- Listening to the story, Ougi reminds Koyomi that she and Sodachi are the same person, and infers her secret past one by one.

4.title: Sodachi Lost, Part One
4.plot: Part 1 of 3. October 27th. Koyomi and Tsubasa head to Sodachi's house because she was absent from school for 2 days. Ougi wants to go together, but Tsubasa rejects her offer. Tsubasa has some doubt as to what she intends.

5.title: Sodachi Lost, Part Two
5.plot: Part 2 of 3. Last night, Koyomi learned his parents temporarily had taken Sodachi into protective custody at his house for a very short while 6 years ago, but he remembers nothing about it. --- Koyomi and Tsubasa visit Sodachi. He broaches the subject of her parents.

6.title: Sodachi Lost, Part Three
6.plot: Part 3 of 3. Koyomi and Tsubasa promise Sodachi to search for her missing mother, and go out. When they talk about questions in this case at a nearby square, Ougi appears again in front of them.

7.title: Shinobu Mail, Part One
7.plot: Part 1 of 6. The night of August 23th. Koyomi meets Suruga at abandoned cram school building. Koyomi has to lead her to Izuko in a hurry because he doesn't have the link of vampire. However, a strong oddity with samurai armor makes an assault on them, and what is worse, the building burst into mysterious flames while they are fighting.

8.title: Shinobu Mail, Part Two
8.plot: Part 2 of 6. Yotsugi saved Koyomi and Suruga from the fire, and runs after the oddity. Although Koyomi and Suruga head for the park where Mayoi had stayed, they get lost their way due to the curse of snail.

9.title: Shinobu Mail, Part Three
9.plot: Part 3 of 6. August 24th, the date has changed. Shinobu joined Koyomi and Suruga at the park. Then, an oddity suddenly attacks them, it looks like a mixed Rainy-devil and Omoshi-kani.

10.title: Shinobu Mail, Part Four
10.plot: Part 4 of 6. The early morning of August 24th. Izuko explains the situation to Koyomi, Shinobu and Suruga at Kita-shirahebi shrine. She tells them that the original oddity slayer Seishiro Shishirui was resurrected as the first minion of the king of oddities Kiss-shot aka Shinobu. They have to find him before he kills human.

11.title: Shinobu Mail, Part Five
11.plot: Part 5 of 6. Koyomi happened to meet human-shaped Seishiro. He wants to continue his relationship with Kiss-shot aka Shinobu, so he makes an attempt on Koyomi's life. Meanwhile, Suruga strongly advises Shinobu to take Seishiro seriously.

12.title: Shinobu Mail, Part Six
12.plot: Part 6 of 6. The night of August 24th. Although the time of the duel between Koyomi and Seishiro is getting close, Koyomi learns that something happened to Tsubasa. And what is worse, Izuko informs him that Hitagi is also in danger.

imdb.plot outline: A peculiar transfer student named Ougi Oshino has just arrived at Naoetsu Private High School. She is quickly introduced to senior student Koyomi Araragi by their mutual friend Kanbaru Suruga, in hopes of obtaining advice regarding a strange discovery she has made. After taking a look at the school's layout, Ougi notices that a classroom has appeared in an otherwise empty place that should not exist. Unsure if this is the work of an apparition, Koyomi and Ougi attempt to unravel the truth behind this enigma. But Koyomi soon discovers, after finding himself locked in with Ougi, that the room holds the memory of an event he had long since forgotten.
imdb.title: Owarimonogatari
plot: A peculiar transfer student named Ougi Oshino has just arrived at Naoetsu Private High School. She is quickly introduced to senior student Koyomi Araragi by their mutual friend Kanbaru Suruga, in hopes of obtaining advice regarding a strange discovery she has made. After taking a look at the school's layout, Ougi notices that a classroom has appeared in an otherwise empty place that should not exist. Unsure if this is the work of an apparition, Koyomi and Ougi attempt to unravel the truth behind this enigma. But Koyomi soon discovers, after finding himself locked in with Ougi, that the room holds the memory of an event he had long since forgotten.
